resources.string: Welcome to Reel Talk, a community\n designed for true film and TV Show fans
Discover and discuss your favorite films,\n movies, and shows
Your display name will be visible to other users.
Your birthday will be used to tailor our content for you.\n It won\'t be shared with any third parties.
Stay in the loop with fellow enthusiasts in\n discussions.
Get instant alerts on upcoming movies,\n fan-favorite recommendations, and\n exciting movie events
You can turn it off anytime in the system\n notification settings.
Let\'s get to know you better and\n personalize your experience!
Select your top 3 genres for\n movies and TV
Keep it real,\n but be kind

Welcome, we're so excited to have you here!

 At Reel Talk, we believe that every individual brings something unique to our community. We are committed to fostering a safe and respectful environment for everyone to engage in exciting conversations.

 In our mission to encourage respect and belongingness, we ask that you join us by adhering to our guidelines. We take these guidelines seriously, and failure to adhere to them may result in being banned from our community. Thanks for your cooperation.

 With love,
 The Reel Talk Team
